headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Emerson Electric (EMR): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Emerson Electric (EMR) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Looking to Generate Passive Income? Consider These 3 Rock-Solid Dividend King Stocks
summary: Emerson Electric has restructured its business to focus on long-term growth opportunities.  Kenvue is a good choice for investors mainly focused on capital preservation and passive income.  American States Water is a water utility stock that has paid dividends since its founding in 1931.
